Container.Name: Huntorr
Container.Overview: Huntorr is a quick and simple tool for performing torrent searches against the three top torrent sites and automatically adding them to your qBittorrent client.
Container.Category: Downloaders: MediaApp:Video MediaServer:Video Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: torrent usenet 1337x qbittorrent download piratebay eztv plex jellyfin

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Host
Config.Description: The IP address or hostname of your qBittorrent instance.

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Port
Config.Description: The port number of your qBittorrent Web UI.

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Username
Config.Description: The username for your qBittorrent Web UI.

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Password
Config.Description: The password for your qBittorrent Web UI.

Config.Name: Media Servers - Addresses
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of Plex or Jellyfin server addresses to notify after adding torrents (e.g. Plex:http://192.168.1.2:32400, Jellyfin:http://192.168.1.2:8096)

Config.Name: Media Servers - Tokens
Config.Description: Token for your Plex or Jellyfin server(s) to allow Huntorr to notify them of new content. (e.g. Plex:abc, Jellyfin:def)

Config.Name: Media Servers - Library Name
Config.Description: Name of the library to update on your media server(s) after adding torrents.
